name: Kūnlún shān rōˈtāSH(ə)n
description: The Kunlun Loop is a Dragomir Artenie’s gif-transduction of tradition 回转(Huízhuǎn)/ abundance turn around painting . New York Times critic Holland Cotter has described the screen's solid, saturated colors and robust forms as being regular as "textile patterns" … “an archaic, hieratic look unlike other crypto artists so far”
